com.ardic.android.iotignite.things

Class Thing

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ardic.android.iotignite.connection.ServiceInstance
      • com.ardic.android.iotignite.things.Thing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IThing, ThingListener

    public final class Thing
extends com.ardic.android.iotignite.connection.ServiceInstance
implements IThing, ThingListener
    End point objects of IotIgnite. Thing's are configurable and virtual object to communicate with ARCloud
    Author:
    ARDIC
    See Also:
    IotIgniteManager, Node, ThingManager

      • Thing

        protected Thing(android.content.Context context,
                String thingID,
                ThingType thingType,
                ThingCategory thingCategory,
                boolean isActuator,
                ThingListener listener,
                ThingManager mThingManager)
        General thing constructor.
        Parameters:
        context - : Context of your application.
        thingID - : Unique id of your thing.
        thingType - : Type of your thing.
        thingCategory - : Category of your thing.
        isActuator - : Is this thing gonna be used as an actuator or not.
        listener - : Thing listener for actuator and configuration callbacks.

  • onConfigurationReceived

    public void onConfigurationReceived(Thing newThing)
    Description copied from interface: ThingListener
    Return new configured Thing object. When Thing object got a new configuration. It's internally changes the config. This listener is only for notifying the application which object has been changed.
    Specified by:
    onConfigurationReceived in interface ThingListener
    See Also:
    ThingConfiguration, Thing
